body_html: @cancan101 that would be great, something like that. The map_fn method is looking promising for the mean time (as i'm short on time to go and patch TF myself) but I had some PIL/Pillow tools built already in Python so might look at trying to feed in and out of that (although would much rather prefer an in-graph solution!)
